  • Element
com.github.deltaspikedbunit.annotation

Annotation Type ExpectedDatabase


  • @Documented
@Inherited
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface ExpectedDatabase
    Asserts that a database is in given state after tests have run.
    Author:
    Luigi Bitonti, Phillip Webb, Mario Zagar

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      DatabaseAssertionMode assertionMode
      Database assertion mode to use.
      Class<? extends DataSetModifier>[] modifiers
      A set of DataSetModifier that will be applied to the IDataSet before it is used.
      boolean override
      If this expectation overrides any others that have been defined at a higher level.
      String query
      Optional SQL to retrieve the actual subset of the table rows from the database.
      String table
      Optional table name that can be used to limit the comparison to a specific table.
      String value
      Provides the location of the dataset that will be used to test the database.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Provides the location of the dataset that will be used to test the database. Locations are relative to the class under test.
        Returns:
        The dataset location
        See Also:
        DbUnitConfiguration.dataSetLoader()
        Default:
        ""

      • assertionMode

        public abstract DatabaseAssertionMode assertionMode
        Database assertion mode to use. Default is DatabaseAssertionMode.DEFAULT.
        Returns:
        Database assertion mode to use
        Default:
        com.github.deltaspikedbunit.assertion.DatabaseAssertionMode.DEFAULT

      • table

        public abstract String table
        Optional table name that can be used to limit the comparison to a specific table.
        Returns:
        the table name
        Default:
        ""

      • query

        public abstract String query
        Optional SQL to retrieve the actual subset of the table rows from the database. NOTE: a table name must also be specified when using a query.
        Returns:
        the SQL Query
        Default:
        ""

      • override

        public abstract boolean override
        If this expectation overrides any others that have been defined at a higher level. Defaults to true
        Returns:
        if this annotation overrides any others
        Default:
        true

      • modifiers

        public abstract Class<? extends DataSetModifier>[] modifiers
        A set of DataSetModifier that will be applied to the IDataSet before it is used. Can refer to a static or inner class of the test.
        Returns:
        the modifiers to apply
        Default:
        {}
